synopsis.native: Youri, 16 ans, a grandi à Gagarine, immense cité de briques rouges d’Ivry-sur-Seine, où il rêve de devenir cosmonaute. Quand il apprend qu’elle est menacée de démolition, Youri décide de rentrer en résistance. Avec la complicité de Diana, Houssam et des habitants, il se donne pour mission de sauver la cité, devenue son " vaisseau spatial ".
synopsis.english: Yuri, 16, has lived all his life in Gagarine Towers, a vast red brick housing project on the outskirts of Paris. From the heights of his apartment, he dreams of becoming an astronaut. But when plans to demolish his community’s home are leaked, Yuri joins the resistance. With his friends Diana and Houssam, he embarks on a mission to save Gagarine, transforming the estate into his own “starship”.
